Package cea.streamer

Class ModelRunner

java.lang.Object
cea.streamer.ModelRunner
public class ModelRunner
extends java.lang.Object
Performs the inference and evaluate the results using the specified metrics Setup in streaming.props Data obtained from database or from a file (path specified in streaming.props)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> run​(java.lang.String sourceType, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String modelStoredPath) throws java.lang.Exception
      Run a model. Algorithm to use, source of data and other parameters are specified in the properties
      Parameters:
      sourceType - From where data must be retrieved. Option: [influx , file]
      id - Problem id. Option: [influx data base DB name, folder where the properties files are located]
      modelStoredPath - where the model is stored
      Returns:
      Vector records returned after running the model and the pre-post processing
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - throwing exception when the properties files reading fails
